disk.lowSpaceWarning: Only {available} GB free on your download drive. Downloads may fail.

download.title: Download
download.subtitle: Paste a link to get started

options.title: Options
options.createPresetDescription: Save your current settings as a preset for quick access later.
options.convertToMp4: Convert all downloaded videos to mp4
options.useHLS: Use HLS for YouTube if possible
options.cookiesDescription: Use cookies from your browser to bypass YouTube's 'Sign in to confirm you're not a bot' error. Close your browser before downloading.
options.customCookiesDescription: Paste cookies in Netscape format. You can export them using browser extensions like 'Get cookies.txt' or 'EditThisCookie'.

formats.title: Select Format
formats.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one track
formats.noCombined: No combined formats available. Use Track Builder to select video and audio separately.

tracks.enterUrl: Enter a URL to select tracks
tracks.hint: You can download now with best quality, or wait for formats to load
tracks.title: Track Selection

blocks.aria2NotInstalled: Install aria2 in Settings to enable faster downloads
blocks.aria2Active: aria2 will be used for faster downloads
blocks.luxInfo: Lux is mainly focused on Chinese video platforms, on big sites like BiliBIli yt-dlp still may perform better.
blocks.advancedDesc: Speed limits, folders, and other options

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.subtitle: Active and completed downloads
downloads.startHint: Start a download from the home page
downloads.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, author, date, file extension, etc.
downloads.endMessage: That's everything you downloaded so far!
downloads.noFilePath: File path not available for this item

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Here you can configure the app

general.title: General
general.startOnBootDescription: Launch Comine automatically when you log in
general.startMinimizedDescription: Start in the system tray instead of showing the window
general.watchClipboardTooltip: Monitor clipboard for supported URLs and auto-fill the download input
general.closeBehaviorDescription: What happens when you click the close button

processing.title: Download Backend
processing.defaultProcessorDescription: Choose which tool processes your downloads. Auto mode picks the best one for each URL.
processing.autoDescription: Automatically selects the best processor for each URL. Uses cobalt for supported sites (faster), falls back to yt-dlp for everything else.
processing.youtubePlayerClientDescription: Client chain for downloads. Default 'tv,android_sdkless' provides best quality. Clients are tried in order as fallbacks.
processing.usePlayerClientForExtractionDescription: Use the same player clients for fetching video info. When disabled, uses the faster extraction client below.
processing.extractionPlayerClientDescription: Client chain for fetching video info. 'android_sdkless' is fastest (no JS/token). Comma-separated for fallbacks (e.g. android_sdkless,web_safari).

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.useAudioPathTooltip: Save audio files (music, podcasts) to a different folder
downloads.usePlaylistFoldersTooltip: Save playlist downloads in subfolders named after the playlist
downloads.youtubeMusicAudioOnlyTooltip: Automatically download audio only when URL is from music.youtube.com
downloads.embedThumbnailTooltip: Embed the video thumbnail as cover art in downloaded audio files
downloads.concurrentDownloadsDescription: Number of downloads that can run simultaneously
downloads.watchClipboardForFilesTooltip: Show notifications when direct file download URLs are copied (e.g., .zip, .exe files)
downloads.fileDownloadNotificationsTooltip: Display popup notification when a file URL is detected
downloads.aria2ConnectionsDescription: Maximum parallel connections for faster downloads (1-16)
downloads.aria2SplitsDescription: Number of parts to split files for parallel downloading (1-16)
downloads.bypassProxyForDownloadsDescription: Download files directly without using proxy (faster)

app.title: App
app.autoUpdateDescription: Check for updates automatically when the app starts
app.allowPreReleasesTooltip: Receive beta and development versions before stable release. May contain bugs.
app.sendStatsTooltip: Help improve Comine by sharing anonymous usage data. No personal information, URLs, or filenames are collected.
app.telemetryNotice: Sharing anonymous stats to help improve Comine
app.sizeUnitDescription: Choose how file sizes are displayed
app.showHistoryStatsDescription: Display statistics bar at the bottom of downloads page
app.thumbnailThemingDescription: Use colors from thumbnails for progress bars and hover effects
app.builderThumbnailGlowDescription: Apply a subtle glow effect using thumbnail colors in video, playlist, and channel views
app.backgroundVideoUrlDescription: Enter a URL or local file path for the background video
app.backgroundImageUrlDescription: Enter a URL or local file path for the background image
app.backgroundBlurAmountDescription: Adjust the blur intensity for video and image backgrounds
app.backgroundOpacityDescription: Control the transparency of the background to see your desktop
app.windowTintDescription: Adjust the app's dark overlay to control how much of the window effect shows through
app.accentColorDescription: Color for buttons, toggles, and highlights
app.accentStyleDescription: Choose the visual style for buttons and highlights
app.useSystemAccentDescription: Get accent color from your device's theme (Android 12+)
app.largeFileWarningMessage: This video file is quite large and may cause performance issues or crashes, especially on mobile devices.
app.largeFileWarningAndroid: On Android, large files are converted to data URLs which can exhaust memory and crash the app.
app.largeFileWarningDesktop: Large video files may cause high memory usage and slow down the app.

deps.title: Dependencies
deps.ytdlpDescription: Downloads videos from YouTube and many other sites
deps.ffmpegDescription: Required for merging video/audio and format conversion
deps.aria2Description: Fast multi-connection downloader for improved speeds
deps.denoDescription: JavaScript runtime required by yt-dlp for YouTube. Fixes 'Sign in to confirm you're not a bot' errors
deps.quickjsDescription: Lightweight JavaScript runtime for yt-dlp PO tokens. Alternative to Deno for YouTube bot detection bypass
deps.luxDescription: Alternative downloader for Bilibili, Douyin, TikTok, and 40+ Chinese platforms
deps.missingYtdlp: yt-dlp is not installed. Please install it from Settings → Dependencies.
deps.missingFfmpeg: ffmpeg is not installed. Please install it from Settings → Dependencies.
deps.missingBoth: yt-dlp and ffmpeg are not installed. Please install them from Settings → Dependencies.

data.title: Data
data.resetSettingsDescription: Restore all settings to their default values
data.resetSettingsConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This cannot be undone.
data.clearHistoryDescription: Remove all items from your download history
data.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all download history? This cannot be undone.
data.exportHistoryDescription: Save your download history to a JSON file
data.importHistoryDescription: Load download history from a JSON file
data.importError: Failed to import history. Please check the file format.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.enabledTooltip: Show popup notifications when media URLs are detected in clipboard while the app is minimized
notifications.monitorDescription: Which monitor to show notifications on
notifications.compactTooltip: Use smaller notifications with icon-only buttons
notifications.fancyBackgroundTooltip: Use the app's background style in notification popups
notifications.thumbnailThemingTooltip: Tint notification background with colors from the thumbnail
notifications.cornerDismissTooltip: Hide the full dismiss button and use only the corner X to close notifications
notifications.offsetDescription: Distance from the screen edge (taskbar height)
notifications.durationDescription: Time before the notification automatically closes
notifications.showProgressTooltip: Keep notification open to show download progress and completion actions

network.title: Network
network.proxyDescription: Configure proxy settings for all network requests
network.proxyModeDescription: Choose how network requests are routed
network.customProxyUrlDescription: Enter your proxy server URL (http, https, or socks5)
network.proxyFallbackTooltip: If the custom proxy fails, try system proxy, then direct connection
network.retryWithoutProxyTooltip: If proxy fails or returns errors (invalid proxy, timeout, HTTP 412), automatically retry without proxy or with system proxy. Works for both yt-dlp and lux downloads.
network.checkIpDescription: Verify your proxy is working by checking your public IP

logs.title: Logs
logs.subtitle: Application logs
logs.openFolderHint: Logs are saved to disk and kept for the last 10 app sessions
logs.copyConfirmMessage: You are about to copy a large amount of log data to your clipboard.
logs.copyHint: Large clipboard content may affect system performance temporarily.

clipboard.noValidUrl: No valid media URL in clipboard

tray.hiddenToTray: Comine is still running in the system tray

notification.clickToDownload: Click to open Comine and download

welcome.title: Welcome to Comine
welcome.subtitle: Download videos from anywhere
welcome.description: Quick setup to configure the basics. You can change these later in Settings.

language.title: Select Your Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the app interface.

setup.title: Quick Setup
setup.description: Configure the essentials to get started.
setup.popupHint: Show a popup when a URL is detected
setup.positionHint: Click on the screen to change popup position
setup.androidNote: Notification settings are available on desktop only

folders.title: Download Location
folders.description: Choose where your downloaded files will be saved.
folders.useAudioPath: Save audio files to a separate folder

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.startOnBootDesc: Launch Comine automatically when you log in
preferences.watchClipboardDesc: Automatically detect media URLs when you copy them
preferences.autoUpdateDesc: Keep Comine up to date automatically

dependencies.title: Installing Components
dependencies.description: Setting up the tools needed to download media.

appearance.title: Make It Yours
appearance.largeFileWarningMessage: This video file is quite large and may cause performance issues or crashes, especially on mobile devices.
appearance.largeFileWarningAndroid: On Android, large files are converted to data URLs which can exhaust memory and crash the app.
appearance.largeFileWarningDesktop: Large video files may cause high memory usage and slow down the app.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Choose how and where popup notifications appear.
notifications.clipboardWarning: Clipboard watching is disabled. Notifications won't appear unless you enable it in Preferences.

ready.title: You're All Set!
ready.description: Everything is configured. Start downloading by pasting a link.
